text: The Men's marathon 2 was a wheelchair marathon event in athletics at the 1984 Summer Paralympics. The race was won by Heinz Frei."New York / Stoke Mandeville 1984 Paralympic Games: Athletics: Men's Marathon 2", International Paralympic Committee ==Results== {| class="wikitable" style="text- align:center" |- !
